logo.name: Pet Haven Logo
logo.description: Whimsical logo featuring a paw print and pet silhouettes representing Pet Haven.

sections.title: Welcome to Pet Haven
sections.subtitle: Your Pet's Favorite Destination
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Explore the ultimate destination for all things pets! From furry companions to scaly friends, Pet Haven offers everything you need to keep your pets happy and healthy. **Shop Now** to discover exclusive products and special discounts.

images.name: Pet Haven Hero Image
images.description: A joyous image showcasing a variety of pets including a golden retriever, a tabby cat, and a parakeet.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Mission to Care
sections.name: About Section
sections.label: About
sections.content: At Pet Haven, we believe that every pet deserves love, care, and the best products available. Our mission is to provide pet owners with high-quality pet supplies that cater to all types of pets, ensuring their happiness and well-being. Our experienced team of pet enthusiasts is dedicated to serving you and your furry friends.

images.name: Pet Care Team Background
images.description: Background image of our friendly staff engaging with various pets at the store.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive Pet Care Solutions
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Grooming Services  
Keep your pet looking fabulous with our top-notch **grooming services**. Our professional groomers are trained to handle all breeds with care and precision.

### Veterinary Care  
We offer on-site veterinary services to ensure your pet's health is always a top priority. Schedule a check-up with our licensed veterinarians.

### Pet Sitting & Boarding  
Going out of town? Our **pet sitting and boarding services** provide a safe and comfortable space for your pets.

images.name: Pet Grooming Image
images.description: A pet groomer meticulously grooming a poodle, showcasing our grooming services.

sections.title: Product Gallery
sections.subtitle: Explore Our Bestsellers
sections.name: Gallery Section
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content:
Discover our wide range of best-selling pet products, from nutritious food to exciting toys. Our gallery showcases everything you need for your pets.

![Product Gallery](#)

images.name: Pet Supplies Gallery
images.description: A collection of lifestyle images featuring popular pet products such as toys, food, and accessories.
